data.title: US 380 Collin and Denton County
data.text:
Collin County

US 380 COLLIN COUNTY PROJECTS

The yellow section is still under consideration as part of the environmental review process and the final alignment may differ from what is shown on this map.

TxDOT has completed the US 380 Collin County Feasibility Study. The Collin County corridor has been separated into five independent project segments. In each segment except US 380 Princeton, TxDOT has completed environmental study, preliminary engineering and alignment selection. The projects will advance on different schedules depending on traffic needs and funding availability.

More information about each segment can be found at the links below:

US 380 Prosper/Frisco (from Teel Pkwy/Championship Dr to Coit Rd)

US 380 McKinney (from Coit Rd to FM 1827)

US 380 Princeton (from FM 1827 to CR 560)

US 380 Farmersville (from CR 560 to CR 699/Hunt County Line)

Spur 399 (from US 75 to US 380)

US 380 Breakout Projects Tabloid

For questions, please contact the TxDOT Dallas District at (214) 320-6100.

Collin County Feasibility Study - Completed

Denton County
